records.location_details: Samos hotspot, Vathy town, reception centre, HCG premises
records.where_clear: Samos island, Vathy town and hotspot
records.context_note: Continuous disturbances in Samos hotspot. Migrants started fire, protested against bad living conditions, and clashed with authorities. Situation returned to normal by 20:00 LT.
records.evidence_quote: Continuous disturbances in Samos hotspot... a group of Africans started fire once again... another big group of the migrants just descended from the camp to Vathy town to protest against the bad living conditions

records.context_note: Protest against Frontex on Samos island, organized by local community and authorities, due to bad living conditions and overcrowding at the reception center. Mayor of Eastern Samos called for transfers to mainland.
records.evidence_quote: Protest against Frontex at Samos island... organized by the local community and the local authorities... against Frontex in Samos today (Saturday 19/10).

records.context_note: Big fire in Samos Island and fights between groups of migrants. A fight started in Vathy involving 2 groups of migrants, one Syrian, one Afghan. 3 people stabbed. Conflict moved to the camp, police used tear gas. No information on fire cause, no fire-related injuries.
records.evidence_quote: On 14 October at 21:00 a fight between different gorups of migrants started at Samos. In addition, a big fire occurred in the area... 3 people were stabbed and transported to the hospital.

records.context_note: Protesting migrants set fire inside and outside Moria camp, demanding transfer to mainland. One Afghan woman died in the fire. Migrants clashed with police and firefighters. Several people brought to hospital. Police reinforcement ordered from Piraeus.
records.evidence_quote: Protesting migrants have set fire inside and outside the Moria camp... One woman (AFG) died in the fire... Several people were brought to the hospital.

records.location_details: area north of Oinousses (near Chios island)
records.where_clear: Sea area north of Oinousses, near Chios island
records.location_text_raw: area north of Oinousses (near Chios island)
records.context_note: A capsized boat detected north of Oinousses. 12 persons rescued, 2 corpses recovered. Initially 4 persons missing, later found dead. Total 6 dead. One facilitator (TUR) arrested. Incident under investigation.
records.evidence_quote: A capsized boat was detected... 12 persons have been rescued and 2 corpses have been recovered... all missing 4 persons were found dead under the capsized boat.

records.location_details: Samos in a boat, Kokkari area
records.context_note: One dead body found in a boat in Samos. A female Syrian migrant (60-70 years old) was found dead in a boat with 13 other migrants in Kokkari area. Migrants claimed she died an hour before landing. Body transported to Samos hospital.
records.evidence_quote: One dead body was found in Samos in a boat... A female migrant was discovered already dead in the boat (SYR, age 60-70).

records.context_note: Minor killed in Moria RIC - Lesvos. 3 Afghan minors started fighting, one died after being stabbed. The other two were injured and transferred to Mytilini hospital. Police investigation ongoing.
records.evidence_quote: 3 Afghan minors (14 and 15 years old) started fighting in Moria RIC and one of them died after being stabbed. The other two migrants have been injured

records.location_details: proximity area of Agathonisi island, Samos, inside of the GTW (Greek Territorial Waters)
records.where_clear: Greek Territorial Waters near Agathonisi island, Samos
records.location_text_raw: proximity area of Agathonisi island, Samos
records.context_note: Hostile maneuvers by Turkish patrol vessel against a Frontex asset (tender) inside Greek Territorial Waters near Agathonisi island. TUR patrol boat entered GTW while Frontex asset was identifying Turkish fishing vessels. Dangerous maneuvers put crew safety at risk.
records.evidence_quote: Hostile maneuvers by TUR patrol vessel vs Text Removed - Justification 6... inside of the GTW... The dangerous maneuvers made by the TUR Patrol boat put at risk the safety of the crew.

records.where_clear: Hospital (location not specified, likely near operation area)
records.context_note: A Frontex staff member (Text Removed - Justification 4) went to the hospital for throat inflammation and underwent tonsillitis surgery.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Justification 4, went last evening to the hospital because of a throat inflammation, this morning at 2am a surgery of tonsillitis (amigdalite) was performed.

records.location_details: East of Lesvos, Pamfila sea area, east side of Lesvos island
records.where_clear: Pamfila sea area, east of Lesvos island
records.context_note: Capsized boat east of Lesvos. 57 migrants rescued and 7 dead bodies recovered (4 women, 1 man, 2 children). SAR operation launched. Departure country: Turkey. Involved authorities: HCG.
records.evidence_quote: Capsized boat, East of Lesvos. 57 migrants rescued and 07 dead bodies recovered... a capsized boat was spotted by Text Removed - Justification 6 at Pamfila sea area, east side of Lesvos island.
